name: @fearlessfara/vela
description: TypeScript API Gateway VTL engine with exact APIGW behavior using Chevrotain

scripts.build: npm run build:node && npm run build:browser && npm run build:umd
scripts.test: npm -w packages/core run test && npm -w packages/apigw run test
scripts.test:watch: npm -w packages/core run test:watch & npm -w packages/apigw run test:watch
scripts.test:single: echo 'Deprecated: use vitest conformance tests' && exit 0
scripts.compare:velocity: npm run compare:velocity:java && npm -w packages/core run build && tsc -p scripts/tsconfig.json && node dist/scripts/compare-velocity.js
